entry.et: Middle English ernen, from Old English earnian; akin to Old High German arnōn to reap, Czech jeseň autumn

def.dt: :to receive as return for effort and especially for work done or services rendered
:to bring in by way of return bonds earning 10 percent interest
:to come to be duly worthy of or entitled or suited to she earned a promotion
:to make worthy of or obtain for the suggestion earned him a promotion
